deals.title: Almond Butter Acai Bowl
deals.itemDescription:
Base: acai, banana, almond milk.

Toppings: almond butter, hemp granola.
 
The Almond Butter and Hemp Açaí Bowl is a blend of organic acai sourced from the amazon rainforest and blended with a touch of banana for a creamy consistency. This bowl is topped with almond butter and organic hemp granola.

deals.title: Purple Haze Smoothie
deals.itemDescription:
Blueberries, strawberries, banana, plant-based protein, spirulina and coconut water.

The Purple Haze Smoothie contains spirulina as a key ingredient. Spirulina is a blue-green algae that is rich in chlorophyll and has been found to have anti-inflammatory properties and may even lower cholesterol. This smoothie uses plant-based vegan protein and is dairy-free.

deals.title: Pure Power Smoothie
deals.itemDescription:
Cauliflower, banana, almond butter, cinnamon, coconut butter, grass-fed whey protein and almond milk.

The Pure Power Smoothie is a healthy smoothie fueled by cauliflower. We combine cauliflower with almond butter, almond milk and grass-fed whey protein to create a truly unique superfood smoothie.

deals.title: Chicken Shawarma
deals.itemDescription: Immerse yourself in a culinary delight with our Chicken Shawarma – a taste sensation that transcends ordinary dining. Tender, marinated chicken, slow-roasted to perfection, creates a succulent masterpiece that's a symphony of flavors. Each bite unveils a harmony of spices, coupled with a medley of crisp vegetables, all embraced by a soft, warm flatbread.
